name: Project Vanguard
description:
Controls: E to interact with planets, LMB to choose text

A short space game done for a beginners jam. This is what was done when the jam was finished, I just decided to sleep for a few extra hours rather than polish it and submit it in time. I may flesh the game out further, but this was more a proof of concept to myself that I could accomplish anything at all. 

Apologies for any misspellings and how janky the actual game is. There isn't much point to it, but it was definitely an adventure to create. I set out to accomplish something with an animated opening, a usable play button, a moveable component, and then dialogue setup.

Story:

You are Star Vanguard, an elite group that travels the galaxies providing support regardless of species or planet. This time around you are searching for Vuna 3, to make a supply drop off. Press E to interact with the planet.
